entry.title: Flying
entry.summary: I have flown a lot (for me) lately; it has been both wonderful and terrible. I love seeing different places; I hate being away from my family.

entry.title: Picking Fights
entry.summary: If you’re in a meeting and you know there’s a fight to win, fight that one as hard as you have to… and let every other, less important thing go.

entry.title: Podcasting Sound Goal
entry.summary: People who edit podcasts take different tacks on this, but for Winning Slowly, I happily shift around interactions, cut “uhhs”, and generally improve the sound. My goal is for the show to be clear, not for it to be exactly what we recorded.

entry.title: TSA water
entry.summary: Dear TSA, allow me to resolve your worry that “it could technically be anything in that water bottle”—by drinking from it.

entry.title: Baptist newspapers
entry.summary: For a class this year, I had to subscribe to a Baptist state paper. I picked the North Carolina paper, the Biblical Recorder. The experience of the “digital paper” is awful. It’s basically scans in a copy-protected container—as un-web-native as can be. These things need to improve, or they’ll die in the next generation.
